channel.title: Core on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Core on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: develop
item.description: Known bugs (34 campaigns / 42 issues) tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/06_statistics.ts : PrestaShop#37520 : Stats > Newsletter : Uncaught TypeError: e is undefined PrestaShop#37521 : Stats > Sales and orders : Uncaught TypeError: e is undefined tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_checkEndpoints.ts : PrestaShop#38784 : Delete / list / tests discounts PrestaShop#38647 : GET & POST endpoints for each type tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/03_hook/01_putHookStatusId.ts : PrestaShop#34507 : API : Endpoint PUT /api/hook-status - Issues Doc Swagger & Enpoint format tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/03_hook/02_getHooks.ts : PrestaShop#35616 : Endpoint /api/hooks & List of Hooks : Incorrect count of hooks tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/06_product/08_patchProductId.

item.title: 9.0.x
item.description: Known bugs (32 campaigns / 39 issues) tests/UI/campaigns/audit/BO/06_statistics.ts : PrestaShop#37520 : Stats > Newsletter : Uncaught TypeError: e is undefined PrestaShop#37521 : Stats > Sales and orders : Uncaught TypeError: e is undefined tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/03_hook/01_putHookStatusId.ts : PrestaShop#34507 : API : Endpoint PUT /api/hook-status - Issues Doc Swagger & Enpoint format tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/03_hook/02_getHooks.ts : PrestaShop#35616 : Endpoint /api/hooks & List of Hooks : Incorrect count of hooks tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/06_product/08_patchProductId.ts : PrestaShop#38787 : API : Endpoint PATCH /product/{productId} : Field availableDate : Can’t use a datetime PrestaShop#38788 : API : Endpoint PATCH /product/{productId} : Field ean13 : Field not in response or redundant tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/06_product/10_getProductsSearch.

item.title: 8.2.x
item.description: Known bugs (10 campaigns / 9 issues) tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/01_clientCredentialGrantFlow/01_internalAuthServer/02_resourceEndpoint.ts : PrestaShop#29813 : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/issues/29813 tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/01_clientCredentialGrantFlow/02_externalAuthServer/01_authorizationEndpoint.ts : Remove it when Puppeteer will accept self signed certificates tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/01_clientCredentialGrantFlow/02_externalAuthServer/02_resourceEndpoint.ts : Remove it when Puppeteer will accept self signed certificates tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/02_orders/01_orders/viewAndEditOrder/11_checkInvoice.ts : PrestaShop#22581 : INVOICE - MAIL / No shop logo on the invoice when you change the port (Docker) tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/08_design/06_imageSettings/11_imageGenerationOnCreation.ts : PrestaShop#30520 : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/issues/30520 tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/08_design/06_imageSettings/13_checkProductImageFormat.ts : PrestaShop#32265 : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/issues/32265 tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/08_design/06_imageSettings/14_checkCategoryImageFormat.ts : PrestaShop#32408 : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/issues/32408 PrestaShop#32404 : Multiple image formats : WebP is not generated when a cover image for a category is uploaded tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/08_design/06_imageSettings/15_checkStoreImageFormat.
